recommendations: Shivangi Malviya “Mohit has worked with me in Amdocs. His technical is very good in Oracle, PLSQL, Java and related frameworks. This has really helped him to understand complex business workflows very quickly and efficiently. Quick learner is making him unique. Also his way of solving problem is always making him different from others. Keep up the good work.”
Virendra Gulhane “Mohit is a dynamic young geek, having expertise on Oracle, PL/SQL, Java, REST, Agile and Data structure.”

projects: [{"title":"Portfolio Management/Common platform ","start_date":"Jul 2019","end_date":"Present","description":"Responsible to enhance the existing portfolio management application to improve the performance of the application by using latest technology along with Java. Working in data layer team to deliver/expose the critical solutions to the service layer. Fix the existing bugs and refactor the code to make it more readable.Responsible to do development to enhance the existing product as per the requirement using Java, Spring, SQL server. Technical skills - Java8, Multithreading, Spring, SQL (Stored procedure, functions, triggers etc)"},{"title":"Suddenlink Consolidation into Altice USA","start_date":"Sep 2017","end_date":"Present","description":"Altice USA is a cable / television provider which has acquired many cable companies in recent time. The project is to merge the functionality of Suddenlink into the Altice with working BAU. These involve the engineering for the provisioning of the services (phone, modem, Setup Box, Security) customer opted, the billing for the same."},{},{},{},{"title":"SPI Payments US (ATT)","start_date":"Jul 2016","end_date":"Sep 2017","description":"Payments (ATT) project is about handling all the payments made through ATT application in US. The SPI (Sensitive personal Information) project was to handle the SPI data of customer while handling their payments, these involved mainly encryption/decryption and verification of the data with banks and sending the information to the Biller."},{},{},{}]
